1.title: Room for Improvement

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: After saying yes on decision day, three couples from the franchise are back to share an inside look into their marriages as they navigate life after getting married at first sight.

2.title: Lost in Transparency

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: After embarking on a relaxing retreat, the couples continue to focus on their relationships by getting to know each other better and identifying the areas of marriage they need to strengthen. The experts are tasked with teaching each couple how to better communicate with their spouse.

3.title: Preparing for the Baby

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: With each couple at different stages in their pregnancies, the experts visit them in their hometowns to help navigate any challenges they are experiencing while preparing for their baby's arrival.

4.title: Change for the Better

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: The three expectant couples are forced to take a deeper look at their marriages as they decide which bad habits they want to banish from their relationships and which positive ones they want to keep. Life takes a sudden, unexpected turn for one couple.

5.title: New Lease on Life

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: After weeks of working on their marriages, the couples have finally reached the halfway point of 'Happily Ever After?' and with their families quickly expanding, they learn the importance of placing family first.

6.title: Routine Maintenance

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: With seismic life-changing events happening, including pregnancy, the birth of a child and buying a new home, the couples must find a way to reinforce their communication and connection before potential issues create separation that can't be fixed.

7.title: Couples Reunited

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: The couples reunite in Boston to meet baby Laura and take advantage of the Married At First Sight support system they've created. The experts meet with the spouses separately, and one husband realizes it's time to confront his wife over an issue that could ultimately tear their marriage apart.

8.title: Beginning of the Happy Ending

episode of.title: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: After eight weeks of guidance, the experts return to the couples' homes one final time to see for themselves if they're on the road from happily married to happily ever after.

imdb.title: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After
akas: Married at First Sight: Happily Ever After (United States)
plot: A follow-up series to "Married at First Sight" featuring couples who decided to stay married.
